content: Killing Authority I have to kill all external authority I have to look inside myself and take 100% responsibility in every way, every thought, emotion, opinion, worldview, decisions and direction in life. I have to liberated myself from my own delusions I have to become Free Totally and Completely I have to make my own consciously decisions
title: Killing Authority
